name: Oxímoro
description:
This game was made in 12 hours as a challenge and a school project. It's not on the same quality level as my important games but you can see how I pulled off some interresting things.

I'd like to keep up a game with that vibe but not alone. If you are interested in making Oxymoron, let's talk ^^!

STORY

Jonas is a boy that gets transported to a chaotic land by a magical spirit. He has to fight the humans' collective impacts on the planet manifested as spirits.
